title: Data Migration Framework
description: Developed for a leading global online payments company using Python, AWS, GCS, and BigQuery. Reduced data migration time by 20% and improved scalability by 30%.

title: Merchant Report Generation
description: Implemented on-demand merchant reports project, increasing data accuracy and reducing report generation time by 40% using Python and SQL.

title: Forest Fire Detection System
description: Developed a real-time forest fire detection system using machine learning algorithms and fuzzy logic, achieving an accuracy rate of 92%.

title: Joint Image Compression & Encryption
description: Created an algorithm for joint image compression and encryption with a compression ratio of 5.2 using JPEG2000 and RC4 encryption techniques.

title: Image Classification using CNNs
description: Implemented a CNN-based image classification project on the CIFAR10 dataset, achieving an accuracy rate of 85%.

title: YouTube Spam Comment Filter
description: Developed a binary classification algorithm for spam comment detection on YouTube, achieving a high accuracy rate using various datasets.
